episodes.title: ALONE. Why it's ok to be alone. 😌
episodes.description:
Many of us find ourselves very alone at times. But alone doesn't necessarily equate to being lonely. 

Come on over to the blog for more information on abuse recovery. 
www.whattheeverlovinghell.com

#abuserecovery #narcisisticabuse #cultrecovery #alone #lonely

episodes.title: How to avoid CULT HOPPING (aka getting into another high demand/high control group or relationship)
episodes.description: I recently spoke at an Ex-Jehovah's Witness convention (yes, they have those...lol) and had a great time speaking on the topic of cult hopping and how to not do that. ☺️

episodes.title: My book- CULT GIRL - is here!!! 😃
episodes.description:
Lili's family joins a "new religion" and everything seems idyllic for awhile. But then Lili's starts to discover all kinds hidden secrets and she must be cunning and courageous to escape before she is in danger. 

#cults #cultrecovery #narcisist #narcissisticabuse #abuserecovery

episodes.title: How narcissistic abusers/cult leaders FAKE EMPATHY 🥹
episodes.description:
Narcissistic abusers and cult leaders learn to parody empathy at a young age and you shouldn't feel bad if you fell for it...stay to the end and I'll tell you why 😌

www.whattheverlovinghell.com

episodes.title: CULT expert is dead wrong about this...🫣
episodes.description: Recently a cult expert attempted to claim that the cult I was in doesn't technically qualify as a cult...and he couldn't be more wrong.

episodes.title: CULTS recruitment speech VS the TRUTH...😳🤣
episodes.description:
What a CULT member would say to recruit you VS what they would say if they told you the HONEST TRUTH about what was actually required. 
Anything you're thinking about joining- whether it's a new relationship or a group of 'like-minded' people...try to make sure they are telling you the whole truth and the full investment.

episodes.title: 😳 I ALMOST joined another CULT!
episodes.description: When you are on your healing journey from having been in a cult or an abusive relationship the likelihood of you joining another high demand/high control group or relationship is SIGNIFICANT. Be cautious.

episodes.title: Two CHARACTERISTICS that may cause you to join a CULT
episodes.description:
It's been suggested that the characteristic of being idealistic makes you a candidate for joining a cult. I agree! But I think being disillusioned is also a factor. 

Check out Mark Vincente's information on cults:
@markvicente7
WTF Is on my mind? Podcast on Apple Podcasts and Spotify

episodes.title: WHO the ever loving hell joins a cult anyway?
What the ever-loving hell is a CULT anyway?
episodes.description: It's a little mysterious...but here are few basic ideas
